name: t3rn
description: t3rn is a Universal Execution Protocol that transforms the multi chain world into a single programmable environment. Instead of merely moving wrapped assets or passing simple messages it packages calldata proofs liquidity and settlement into one transaction that anyone can verify end to end. A decentralized network of more than 14,000 Executors competes to fulfill user intents fronts its own capital and then proves completion on chain to receive reimbursement. The public testnet has already processed over 78 million cross chain orders at less than half a cent each proving production grade throughput and opening the door for advanced crosschain DeFi strategies, cross network governance and AI agent driven workflows.
